mapper.select: SELECT "INDEX", PROD_NO, "SIZE", STACK, TOP, BOTTOM, COLOR_NO, COLOR_NAME, RGB FROM PROD_DETAIL LEFT JOIN PALETTE USING (COLOR_NO) WHERE PROD_NO = #{prodNo} AND STACK > 0 ORDER BY "INDEX", "SIZE" DESC
SELECT IMG_NO, REF_NO, COLOR_NO, IMG_TYPE, IMG_NAME, COLOR_NAME, RGB FROM IMAGE LEFT JOIN PALETTE USING (COLOR_NO) WHERE REF_NO = #{refNo}

SELECT * FROM PRODUCT P JOIN PROD_DETAIL D ON P.PROD_NO = D.PROD_NO JOIN IMAGE I ON P.PROD_NO = I.REF_NO WHERE (P.PROD_NO, "INDEX", "SIZE") IN
(#{item.prodNo}, #{item.index}, #{item.size})

SELECT REVIEW_NO, PROD_NO, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, REVIEW_CONTENT, R.CREATE_DATE, RATING, HEIGHT, WEIGHT, TOP, BOTTOM, ISTRUETOSIZE FROM REVIEW R LEFT JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' AND PROD_NO = #{prodNo}
SELECT * FROM( SELECT * FROM IMAGE WHERE REF_NO=#{prodNo} AND IMG_TYPE=1) WHERE ROWNUM=1
SELECT SEE_THROUGH FROM PRODUCT GROUP BY SEE_THROUGH
SELECT COLOR_NO , COLOR_NAME, RGB FROM PALETTE
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET REVIEW_CONTENT = #{reviewContent}, RATING = #{rating}, HEIGHT = #{height}, WEIGHT = #{weight}, TOP = #{top}, BOTTOM = #{bottom}, ISTRUETOSIZE = #{isTrueToSize} WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo} AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.select: SELECT LINING FROM PRODUCT GROUP BY LINING
SELECT PRICE FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRICE BETWEEN 0 AND 400000
SELECT * FROM PRODUCT LEFT JOIN CATE_SUB USING (CATE_SUB) WHERE CATE_MAIN = #{cateMain}
